original_text: If you hit it with a heavy stick, that hurts it no more than a piece of straw. If you throw a spear at it, it laughs! If you throw a spear at it, it laughs! If you hit it with a heavy stick,
korean_text: 그것은 몽둥이도 지푸라기 같이 여기고 창이 날아오는 소리를 우습게 여기며

sentences.original_text: If you hit it with a heavy stick,
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 당신이 그것을 무거운 막대로 치면,
